entry.title: Saturday: Flurries or snow squalls. High minus 11.
entry.summary: Flurries or snow squalls. Blowing snow. Local amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind southwest 60 km/h gusting to 80 except gusting to 100 over exposed areas. High minus 11. Wind chill minus 33 this morning and minus 24 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Flurries or snow squalls. Temperature rising to minus 8 this evening then falling.
entry.summary: Flurries. Snow squalls this evening. Blowing snow this evening and after midnight. Blowing snow over exposed areas overnight. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northwest 60 km/h gusting to 80 except gusting to 100 over exposed areas this evening. Wind becoming northwest 30 gusting to 50 overnight. Temperature rising to minus 8 this evening then falling. Wind chill near minus 24. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Flurries. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Flurries. Blowing snow over exposed areas. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming southwest 40 gusting to 60 in the afternoon. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 21 in the morning and minus 14 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Saturday 04 February 2023
